item.description:
Before our 5:00 meditation we will be in circle to pray for Mother Earth. Bring a poem, quote or prayer to speak into the circle, or just come to provide your healing thoughts and energy. Stay if you want, for our 5:00 personal meditation.
Prayers for Mother Earth will continue each Sunday throughout July. No charge, or course.
Meditation class at 5 (donations accepted) runs every week, 5-6. You are welcome to stay for guided meditation in Kriya, which includes time in silence.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Prayers for Mother Earth
